mapper.select: select * from place order by place_idx desc
mapper.update: insert into place (place_name, place_addr, place_opentime, place_endtime, place_tel, place_url, place_content, place_category, place_longitude, place_latitude, place_thumb, place_hashtag, place_viewcnt) values (#{place_name}, #{place_addr}, #{place_opentime}, #{place_endtime}, #{place_tel}, #{place_url}, #{place_content}, #{place_category}, #{place_longitude}, #{place_latitude}, #{place_thumb}, #{place_hashtag}, 0)
update place set place_viewcnt=place_viewcnt+1 where place_idx=#{val}
mapper.select: select pl.place_idx as place_idx, pl.place_name as place_name, pl.place_hashtag as place_hashtag, pl.place_viewcnt as place_viewcnt, pl.place_thumb as place_thumb, pl.place_category as place_category, count(bb.placelikes_placeidx) as placeLikeCnt from place as pl left join placelikes as bb on pl.place_idx = bb.placelikes_placeidx group by pl.place_idx order by pl.place_idx desc;

select pl.place_idx as place_idx, pl.place_name as place_name, pl.place_hashtag as place_hashtag, pl.place_thumb as place_thumb, count(bb.placelikes_placeidx) as placeLikeCnt from place as pl left join placelikes as bb on pl.place_idx = bb.placelikes_placeidx group by pl.place_idx order by placeLikeCnt desc;
